誀字的基本解释

誀
èr
引诱。

誀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［èr］
［《廣韻》仍吏切，去志，日。］
［《廣韻》如之切，平之，日。］
(1)引诱。
(2)作人名用字。宋有赵希誀、赵与誀。见《宋史·宗室世系表二》、《宗室世系表五》。

誀字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誀； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1160第06
【廣韻】【集韻】?仍吏切，而去聲。【廣雅】誘也。　又人名。希誀、汝誀，見【宋史·宗室表】。　又【廣韻】如之切【集韻】人之切，?音而。義同。　又【集韻】丑里切，音?。辱也，與恥同。

誀字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
誀字的起名意思

暂无。

Xun
Basic explanation of words
Xun
èr
Lure.
Xun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [èr]
["Guangyun" is still cutting, go to the record, day. ]
["Guangyun" is like cut, flat, day. ]
(1) Seduction.
(2) Use words for names. Song has Zhao Xixun, Zhao Yuxun. See "Song History · Clan Lineage Table 2", "Clan Lineage Table 5".
Xun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youji 1】【Words Department】　誀; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1160 Page 06
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Still cutting, and going away. [Guang Ya] Temptation too.　Another name. For Xixun and Ruxun, see [Song History·Clan List].　[Guangyun] As cut through [Jiyun] Cut through people,? Sound. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Ugly, sound?. Shame is the same as shame.
